utils/activity/Makefile - pgsql17devel-backend

  1. #-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2. #
  3. # Makefile for backend/utils/activity

  8. # src/backend/utils/activity/Makefile
  9. #
  10. #-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  12. subdir = src/backend/utils/activity
  13. top_builddir = ../../../..
  14. include $(top_builddir)/src/Makefile.global

  16. override CPPFLAGS := -I. -I$(srcdir) $(CPPFLAGS)

  18. OBJS = \
  19.     backend_progress.o \
  20.     backend_status.o \
  21.     pgstat.o \
  22.     pgstat_archiver.o \
  23.     pgstat_bgwriter.o \
  24.     pgstat_checkpointer.o \
  25.     pgstat_database.o \
  26.     pgstat_function.o \
  27.     pgstat_io.o \
  28.     pgstat_relation.o \
  29.     pgstat_replslot.o \
  30.     pgstat_shmem.o \
  31.     pgstat_slru.o \
  32.     pgstat_subscription.o \
  33.     pgstat_wal.o \
  34.     pgstat_xact.o \
  35.     wait_event.o \
  36.     wait_event_funcs.o

  38. include $(top_srcdir)/src/backend/common.mk

  40. wait_event_funcs.o: wait_event_funcs_data.c
  41. wait_event_funcs_data.c: wait_event_types.h

  43. wait_event.o: pgstat_wait_event.c
  44. pgstat_wait_event.c: wait_event_types.h
  45.     touch $@

  47. wait_event_types.h: $(top_srcdir)/src/backend/utils/activity/wait_event_names.txt generate-wait_event_types.pl
  48.     $(PERL) $(srcdir)/generate-wait_event_types.pl --code $<

  50. clean:
  51.     rm -f wait_event_types.h pgstat_wait_event.c wait_event_funcs_data.c
